<s> BOSTON AND SIMILAR MARKETS ARE EXCEPTIONS TO THE RULE THOUGH </s>
<s> GENERALLY ECONOMISTS PREDICT THAT HOME PRICES NATIONWIDE IN THE NEXT FEW YEARS WILL RISE AT THE MOST ONLY A FEW PERCENTAGE POINTS FASTER THAN INFLATION </s>
<s> AND IN SOME DEPRESSED REGIONS HOMES ARE ACTUALLY DEPRECIATING </s>
<s> <NOISE> IN WATERLOO IOWA A FARM EQUIPMENT FACTORY TOWN HOME SELLERS ARE COMPETING WITH BANKS STRUGGLING TO UNLOAD HOMES THEY'VE REPOSSESSED </s>
<s> PRICES AROUND HERE ARE WHERE THEY WERE IN NINETEEN SEVENTY SIX TO NINETEEN SEVENTY EIGHT SAYS NANCY ERICKSON A REAL ESTATE AGENT </s>
<s> EVEN WHEN COMPLAINTS ARE FILED THEY CAN BE DIFFICULT TO VERIFY </s>
<s> AGENCIES GENERALLY DON'T USE UNDERCOVER TESTERS POSING AS PROSPECTIVE TENANTS AS THEY DO IN RACE DISCRIMINATION COMPLAINTS THEY FEAR THAT THE TESTER COULD BE ATTACKED </s>
<s> INSTEAD THEY TRY TO BUILD CASES ON THE TESTIMONY OF CURRENT AND FORMER TENANTS </s>
<s> RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE </s>
<s> THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT </s>
<s> THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR </s>
<s> THE DOLLAR'S SLIPPAGE CAME DESPITE MORE COMMENTS FROM TREASURY SECRETARY JAMES BAKER AIMED AT SUPPORTING IT </s>
<s> IN A TELEVISION INTERVIEW MR. *BAKER* SAID THE U. S. AND ITS TOP SIX ECONOMIC ALLIES ARE PREPARED TO ACT TO ESTABLISH THE DOLLAR AROUND CURRENT LEVELS </s>

<s> GENERALLY THERE'S NO LIMIT ON HOW MUCH OF THEIR FUNDS EMPLOYEES CAN BORROW IF THEIR ACCOUNTS TOTAL TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS OR LESS </s>
<s> FOR LARGER ACCOUNTS EMPLOYEES ARE RESTRICTED TO BORROWING HALF THE TOTAL BUT NO MORE THAN FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS </s>
<s> LOANS MUST BE REPAID WITHIN FIVE YEARS UNLESS THE MONEY GOES TOWARD BUYING A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE IN WHICH CASE LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS CAN BE ARRANGED </s>
<s> BORROWED FUNDS AREN'T TAXED </s>
<s> BUT A WITHDRAWAL IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND IS SUBJECT TO AN ADDITIONAL TEN PERCENT PENALTY TAX </s>
<s> MR. MURRAY FORTY NINE YEARS OLD HAD BEEN SCHEDULED TO ASSUME THE POSTS OF CHAIRMAN AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE ON DECEMBER THIRTY FIRST </s>

<s> MONEY MANAGERS SUCH AS CHASE'S MR. CANTER ALSO APPEARED WILLING TO GIVE THE S. E. C. THE BENEFIT OF THE DOUBT </s>

<s> THEY COULD GET IT DONE BY JUST SEEKING TWO OR THREE BIDS AND THEY WOULDN'T HAVE AS MANY PEOPLE KNOWING ABOUT IT BEFOREHAND </s>
<s> THE CALL IS LIKELY TO PROMPT HOLDERS TO CONVERT THE SHARES INTO COMMON RATHER THAN HAVE THEM REDEEMED </s>
<s> EACH DEPOSITORY SHARE CAN BE CONVERTED INTO ONE AND TWO THIRDS COMMON </s>
<s> AS LONG AS THE COMMON IS ABOVE SIXTEEN DOLLARS AND FIFTY NINE CENTS A SHARE THE COMPANY NOTED THE CONVERSION VALUE EXCEEDS THE REDEMPTION PRICE </s>

<s> ANOTHER ALTERNATIVE IS PROVIDED BY COMMUNITY FOUNDATIONS COLLECTIONS OF SMALLER FUNDS DONATED BY MANY INDIVIDUALS </s>
<s> THE ENDOWMENTS ARE POOLED FOR INVESTMENT PURPOSES BUT GRANTS ARE ISSUED UNDER INDIVIDUAL DONORS' NAMES </s>
<s> FUNDS CAN BE STARTED FOR AS LITTLE AS FIVE THOUSAND DOLLARS AND CONTRIBUTIONS ARE DEDUCTIBLE AT THE FIFTY PERCENT LIMIT </s>

<s> ONE WAS COST </s>
<s> WHENEVER THEY STRAY FROM THE COUNTRY'S COOL CAPITAL THE NORTHERN BRED DOGS NEED AIR CONDITIONED ACCOMMODATION </s>
<s> SPECIAL VEHICLES HAVE BEEN BUILT TO SQUIRE THEM AROUND </s>
<s> EACH DOG NEEDS A TRAINER </s>
<s> <NOISE> A COOK PREPARES THE DOG CHOW </s>
<s> UPKEEP RUNS TO ONE HUNDRED FIFTY DOLLARS A MONTH PER CANINE TRIPLE THE SALARIES OF THE TRAINERS </s>
<s> THE SUIT WAS FILED LAST MONTH ONLY TWO DAYS AFTER A SENATE BANKING COMMITTEE HEARING ON DUAL STOCK CLASSES HELD BY SENATORS </s>
<s> RICHARD C. SHELBY DEMOCRAT ALABAMA AND WILLIAM ARMSTRONG REPUBLICAN COLORADO OPPONENTS OF THE TWO TIER STOCKS </s>

<s> THE FINANCIAL TIMES THIRTY SHARE INDEX WAS OFF THIRTEEN POINT SIX POINTS AT ONE THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED ONE POINT ONE </s>
<s> VOLUME WAS A MODERATE FOUR HUNDRED TWENTY FOUR POINT NINE MILLION SHARES COMPARED WITH MONDAY'S THREE HUNDRED SIXTY NINE POINT TWO MILLION SHARES TRADED </s>
<s> THE ONE HUNDRED SHARE INDEX FINISHED THIRTEEN POINT FOUR POINTS LOWER AT ONE THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED SIXTY TWO POINT SIX </s>
<s> BUT OTHER EVIDENCE ON THE FLAPS IS CONFLICTING </s>
<s> ONE OF THE CREW MEMBERS CAN BE HEARD ON THE COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CALLING OUT FLAPS FIFTEEN FIFTEEN THE CORRECT POSITION FOR THE FLAPS </s>
<s> <NOISE> AND THE RECORDER INDICATES THAT A COCKPIT ALARM THAT SHOULD HAVE ALERTED THE CREW TO IMPROPERLY SET FLAPS DIDN'T GO OFF </s>
<s> A SHORTAGE OF ENERGY AND RAW MATERIALS IS ALREADY WREAKING HAVOC IN MANY OF CHINA'S MAJOR INDUSTRIES </s>
<s> A FACTORY THAT MAKES NIKE SHOES IN GUANGDONG PROVINCE HAS TO RUN A GENERATOR THREE DAYS A WEEK TO STAY IN OPERATION </s>
<s> THE PLANT'S TAIWANESE JOINT VENTURE PARTNERS ARE STOCKPILING COAL AND OIL FOR POWER IN CASE THEIR SUPPLIES GET CUT OFF </s>
<s> MANY NEARBY CHINESE FACTORIES SIMPLY SHUT DOWN TWO OR THREE DAYS A WEEK FOR WANT OF ENERGY </s>

<s> MR. BROOKS'S ARTICLE AWAKENED MEMORIES OF MY TIME AS MR. HOOK'S STUDENT AT NEW YORK UNIVERSITY'S WASHINGTON SQUARE COLLEGE SOME TWENTY EIGHT YEARS AGO </s>

<s> THEY TOTAL MORE THAN ONE FIFTH OF THE GROSS NATIONAL PRODUCT THE VALUE OF ALL THE GOODS AND SERVICES PRODUCED IN THE NATION </s>

<s> THE FIGURES ARE ADJUSTED FOR SEASONAL FLUCTUATIONS INCLUDING THIS YEAR'S EARLY EASTER BUT NOT FOR INFLATION </s>

<s> RECENT COVERAGE OF THE CLOSING OF LONG ISLAND LIGHTING COMPANY'S NUCLEAR POWER PLANT BRINGS TO LIGHT A FASCINATING IRONY </s>
<s> THE VICTORY CELEBRATION OF THOSE WHO OPPOSED THE PLANT MAY BE SHORT LIVED </s>
<s> WITHOUT THIS PLANT LONG ISLAND STANDS A VERY GOOD CHANCE OF MAJOR SHORTAGES IN ELECTRICAL SUPPLIES DURING ITS EVER INCREASING PEAK DEMAND PERIODS </s>
<s> THIS LACK OF RELIABILITY WILL BE A SIGNAL TO BUSINESS AND INDUSTRY THAT LONG ISLAND IS NOT A DESIRABLE PLACE TO LOCATE </s>

<s> WHAT TRIGGERED G. M.'S NEW STRATEGY ISN'T CLEAR </s>
<s> WHILE G. M. APPARENTLY HAS DECIDED THAT ITS INCREASINGLY GENEROUS INCENTIVE PROGRAMS HAD GOTTEN PROHIBITIVELY EXPENSIVE CUTTING PRODUCTION IS COSTLY TOO </s>
<s> THE HIGH FIXED COSTS OF IDLE FACILITIES SURELY WILL DEPRESS G. M.'S FIRST QUARTER PROFIT </s>
<s> EVEN WHEN COMPLAINTS ARE FILED THEY CAN BE DIFFICULT TO VERIFY </s>
<s> AGENCIES GENERALLY DON'T USE UNDERCOVER TESTERS POSING AS PROSPECTIVE TENANTS AS THEY DO IN RACE DISCRIMINATION COMPLAINTS THEY FEAR THAT THE TESTER COULD BE ATTACKED </s>
<s> INSTEAD THEY TRY TO BUILD CASES ON THE TESTIMONY OF CURRENT AND FORMER TENANTS </s>
<s> THE REMAINING OFFSETTING COLLECTIONS OF MORE THAN THREE BILLION DOLLARS COME FROM USER FEES WHICH ALSO CLEARLY ARE NOT TAXES </s>
<s> A USER FEE IS A SPECIFIC CHARGE FOR A DIRECT BENEFIT RECEIVED </s>
<s> LIKE AN ASSET SALE BUT UNLIKE A TAX A USER FEE DOES NOT INVOLVE COMPULSION </s>
<s> ONE CHARACTERISTIC OF USER FEES IS THAT THEY REVEAL HOW MUCH GOVERNMENT PROGRAMS ARE REALLY WORTH TO DIRECT RECIPIENTS IN THE MOST DIRECT AND MEANINGFUL WAY POSSIBLE </s>
<s> ONE OF THE STRONGEST ARGUMENTS THAT A GOVERNMENT PROGRAM IS WORTHWHILE OCCURS WHEN IT HAS A USER FEE AND THE FEE COVERS COSTS </s>
<s> THE REVERSE IS ALSO TRUE AND THAT IS ONE REASON SOME BENEFICIARIES OPPOSE USER FEES </s>
<s> GRAINS AND SOYBEANS PRICES WERE MIXED AMID RESISTANCE TO TRADING IN TANDEM WITH FOREIGN CURRENCIES AND METALS </s>
<s> LACK OF FARMER SELLING AND FEARS OF A HOT DRY SUMMER BOOSTED SOYBEAN FUTURES </s>
<s> THE STRENGTH IN THE SOYBEAN CONTRACT FOR DELIVERY AFTER THE HARVEST HELPED SEPTEMBER CORN RISE SLIGHTLY AS DID WORRIES ABOUT THE SUMMER WEATHER </s>
<s> WHEAT FUTURES WERE MIXED </s>

<s> SMOKERS ARE FEELING THE HEAT BECAUSE COMPANIES ARE TAKING A HARDER LINE ON SUCH ISSUES AS PRODUCTIVITY ,COMMA RISING MEDICAL COSTS AND THE EFFECTS OF PASSIVE SMOKE .PERIOD </s>

<s> SOME CONTINUE TO OPPOSE ROBINS'S EFFORTS TO RESOLVE THE DALKON SHIELD LIABILITY PROBLEMS THROUGH BANKRUPTCY LAW PROCEEDINGS AND FAVOR INSTEAD INDIVIDUAL TRIALS FOR EACH PLAINTIFF </s>

<s> THE FIRM THAT'S NUMBER FIVE OR NUMBER SIX CAN BE JUST AS EFFECTIVE AS THE FIRM THAT'S NUMBER ONE OR NUMBER TWO </s>
<s> SUPPORTERS OF THE EXPORT EFFORT BELIEVE THAT IT IS A VITAL PART OF NURTURING THE COUNTRY'S DOMESTIC INDUSTRY </s>
<s> A RELATIVELY SMALL LOCAL MARKET OF SIXTEEN MILLION CONSUMERS MAKES IT DIFFICULT FOR COMPANIES TO RECOUP RECORDING COSTS UNLESS THE RECORDS SELL OVERSEAS </s>
<s> FURTHERMORE A HEFTY SALES TAX ON RECORDS AND TAPES KEEPS DOMESTIC SALES DOWN THE EXPORT PROMOTERS SAY </s>
<s> HE IS STRIKING NOW AT A TIME WHEN FINANCING FOR BIG DEALS IS READILY AVAILABLE AND THE STOCK PRICE IS DOWN </s>
<s> AS RECENTLY AS AUGUST R. J. R.'S STOCK WAS TRADING LOWER THAN ITS FORTY NINE DOLLAR LEVEL WHEN MR. JOHNSON TOOK OVER IN JANUARY NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN </s>
<s> THE OFFER FOR A LEVERAGED BUY OUT PROBABLY WILL BE AT ABOUT SEVENTY FIVE DOLLARS A SHARE AND NOW OTHER TOBACCO STOCKS ARE SOARING TOO </s>

<s> THEN INEXPLICABLY A FEW HOURS LATER ALL COMMUNICATION VANISHES </s>
<s> NONE WITH WASHINGTON NONE WITH OTHER SHIPS NO SIGNALS FROM THE USUAL COMMERCIAL STATIONS ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD </s>
<s> OTHER LARGE AND MIDSIZED CARS POSTING GOOD SCORES WERE THE MERCURY SABLE THE OLDSMOBILE DELTA EIGHTY EIGHT AND THE BUICK REGAL </s>
<s> THREE CARS IN THE CATEGORY PERFORMED POORLY POSTING SCORES ABOVE ONE THOUSAND FOR THE DRIVER'S SIDE </s>
<s> THEY WERE THE BUICK PARK AVENUE THE CHRYSLER NEW YORKER AND THE RENAULT MEDALLION </s>
<s> ALL THE CARS TESTED WERE FOUR DOOR VEHICLES EXCEPT THE BUICK </s>

<s> INSTEAD THEY TRY TO BUILD CASES ON THE TESTIMONY OF CURRENT AND FORMER TENANTS </s>

<s> THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT </s>

<s> THE JOURNAL NEVER CAN BE ALL THINGS TO ALL READERS </s>
<s> IT DOESN'T TRY TO BE </s>
<s> WE ARE NOT PLANNING SPORTS SECTIONS OR LOCAL NEWS COVERAGE COLORED WEATHER MAPS OR STORIES ON EVERY MINOR CRISIS IN THE WORLD </s>
<s> WE DO INTEND TO REMAIN AMERICA'S NATIONAL BUSINESS DAILY AND WITH OUR EXPANDING ASIAN AND EUROPEAN EDITIONS THE GLOBAL BUSINESS DAILY AS WELL </s>
<s> THAT MEANS FOCUSING FIRMLY ON NEWS THAT BUSY BUSINESS PEOPLE TRULY NEED </s>
<s> IN TAIPEI THERE WERE NEWSPAPER REPORTS THAT THE MINISTRY OF FINANCE TURNED DOWN A PROPOSAL TO ALLOW BUSINESS BANKS TO SET UP BRANCHES IN OTHER CITIES </s>
<s> TRADING VOLUME HIT A RECORD AT FIVE HUNDRED TWENTY FOUR MILLION SHARES COMPARED WITH FOUR HUNDRED FORTY NINE MILLION SHARES IN THE PREVIOUS SESSION </s>
<s> TRADERS SAID BANKING ISSUES LED THE MARKET LOWER IN RESPONSE TO THE REPORTS </s>
<s> GENERALLY THERE'S NO LIMIT ON HOW MUCH OF THEIR FUNDS EMPLOYEES CAN BORROW IF THEIR ACCOUNTS TOTAL TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS OR LESS </s>
<s> FOR LARGER ACCOUNTS EMPLOYEES ARE RESTRICTED TO BORROWING HALF THE TOTAL BUT NO MORE THAN FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS </s>
<s> LOANS MUST BE REPAID WITHIN FIVE YEARS UNLESS THE MONEY GOES TOWARD BUYING A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE IN WHICH CASE LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS CAN BE ARRANGED </s>
<s> BORROWED FUNDS AREN'T TAXED </s>
<s> BUT A WITHDRAWAL IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND IS SUBJECT TO AN ADDITIONAL TEN PERCENT PENALTY TAX </s>

<s> A YEAR EARLIER G. M. HUGHES HAD FIRST QUARTER PROFIT OF ONE HUNDRED SIXTEEN POINT TWO MILLION DOLLARS OR SEVENTY SEVEN CENTS A SHARE </s>
<s> PER SHARE EARNINGS FOR THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN AND NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX QUARTERS BENEFITED FROM THIRTY SEVEN POINT TWO MILLION DOLLARS OF GOOD WILL AMORTIZATION IN EACH PERIOD </s>
<s> THE GOOD WILL AMORTIZATION REPRESENTS THE AMOUNT ABOVE BOOK VALUE THAT G. M. PAID FOR HUGHES AIRCRAFT </s>
<s> THAT ACCOUNTING ADJUSTMENT REPRESENTS A CHARGE AGAINST G. M.'S EARNINGS </s>
<s> IN A UNANIMOUS RULING THE JUSTICES UPHELD A FEDERAL LAW ALLOWING RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS ENGAGED IN NONPROFIT ACTIVITIES TO LIMIT HIRING TO PEOPLE OF THEIR OWN FAITH </s>
<s> THE COURT RULED THAT THE CONSTITUTION ISN'T VIOLATED BY EXEMPTING SUCH GROUPS FROM THE FEDERAL LAW THAT BARS BIAS IN EMPLOYMENT BASED ON RELIGION </s>
<s> THE DECISION GIVES RELIGIOUS GROUPS THE FLEXIBILITY TO ESTABLISH THEIR OWN HIRING CRITERIA </s>
<s> THE QUESTION WAS WHAT FORM THIS CONFLICT WOULD TAKE </s>
<s> THE CIVIL WAR WAS FINALLY FOUGHT OVER MAINTAINING THE UNION </s>
<s> <NOISE> BUT WHAT IF THERE HAD BEEN NO UNION </s>
<s> WHAT IF THE SOUTH HAD BEEN A SEPARATE NATION </s>

<s> EVEN WHEN COMPLAINTS ARE FILED THEY CAN BE DIFFICULT TO VERIFY </s>
<s> AGENCIES GENERALLY DON'T USE UNDERCOVER TESTERS POSING AS PROSPECTIVE TENANTS AS THEY DO IN RACE DISCRIMINATION COMPLAINTS THEY FEAR THAT THE TESTER COULD BE ATTACKED </s>
<s> INSTEAD THEY TRY TO BUILD CASES ON THE TESTIMONY OF CURRENT AND FORMER TENANTS </s>
<s> THE REMAINING OFFSETTING COLLECTIONS OF MORE THAN THREE BILLION DOLLARS COME FROM USER FEES WHICH ALSO CLEARLY ARE NOT TAXES </s>
<s> A USER FEE IS A SPECIFIC CHARGE FOR A DIRECT BENEFIT RECEIVED </s>
<s> LIKE AN ASSET SALE BUT UNLIKE A TAX A USER FEE DOES NOT INVOLVE COMPULSION </s>
<s> ONE CHARACTERISTIC OF USER FEES IS THAT THEY REVEAL HOW MUCH GOVERNMENT PROGRAMS ARE REALLY WORTH TO DIRECT RECIPIENTS IN THE MOST DIRECT AND MEANINGFUL WAY POSSIBLE </s>
<s> ONE OF THE STRONGEST ARGUMENTS THAT A GOVERNMENT PROGRAM IS WORTHWHILE OCCURS WHEN IT HAS A USER FEE AND THE FEE COVERS COSTS </s>
<s> THE REVERSE IS ALSO TRUE AND THAT IS ONE REASON SOME BENEFICIARIES OPPOSE USER FEES </s>

<s> TEMPORARY ,COMMA PART -HYPHEN TIME AND CONTRACT WORKERS NOW MAKE UP NEARLY ONE -HYPHEN THIRD OF THE U. S. WORK FORCE .PERIOD </s>

<s> THE CALL IS LIKELY TO PROMPT HOLDERS TO CONVERT THE SHARES INTO COMMON RATHER THAN HAVE THEM REDEEMED </s>
<s> EACH DEPOSITARY SHARE CAN BE CONVERTED INTO ONE AND TWO THIRDS COMMON </s>

<s> ANOTHER ALTERNATIVE IS PROVIDED BY COMMUNITY FOUNDATIONS COLLECTIONS OF SMALLER FUNDS DONATED BY MANY INDIVIDUALS </s>
<s> THE ENDOWMENTS ARE POOLED FOR INVESTMENT PURPOSES BUT GRANTS ARE ISSUED UNDER THE INDIVIDUAL DONORS' NAMES </s>
<s> FUNDS CAN BE STARTED FOR AS LITTLE AS FIVE THOUSAND DOLLARS AND CONTRIBUTIONS ARE DEDUCTIBLE AT THE FIFTY PERCENT LIMIT </s>

<s> RETAIL SALES ARE A CLOSELY WATCHED INDICATOR OF CONSUMER SPENDING </s>
<s> THEY TOTAL MORE THAN ONE FIFTH OF THE GROSS NATIONAL PRODUCT THE VALUE OF ALL THE GOODS AND SERVICES PRODUCED IN THE NATION </s>
<s> BUT THE COMMERCE DEPARTMENT'S MONTHLY ESTIMATE BASED ON EARLY REPORTS FROM RETAILERS FREQUENTLY IS REVISED SUBSTANTIALLY </s>
<s> THE FIGURES ARE ADJUSTED FOR SEASONAL FLUCTUATIONS INCLUDING THIS YEAR'S EARLY EASTER BUT NOT FOR INFLATION </s>
<s> ONE LONGTIME EASTERN PILOT INSISTED THAT THE SAFETY CAMPAIGN INVOLVED NUMEROUS SERIOUS PROBLEMS BUT AFFIRMED THAT THE CARDS OFTEN CONTAINED INSUFFICIENT INFORMATION FOR REGULATORS TO ACT ON </s>
<s> I SENT IN SIX CARDS MYSELF THE PILOT SAID INCLUDING SOME INVOLVING INSUFFICIENT TAKEOFF POWER BECAUSE OF MECHANICAL PROBLEMS </s>
<s> BUT TO IDENTIFY THE PLANE BY NUMBER OR FLIGHT TIME HE ADDED WOULD BE AN ADMISSION OF OUR OWN CULPABILITY IN THE PROBLEM </s>
<s> ANOTHER EASTERN PILOT SAID THAT DESPITE MR. BURNLEY'S CRITICISM HE CONSIDERED THE CAMPAIGN A SUCCESS </s>
<s> INOPERATIVE ITEMS THAT ONCE PERSISTED FOR WEEKS ARE BEING REPAIRED MORE CONSISTENTLY HE SAID </s>
<s> THE SENATE PLAN WOULD PROVIDE THIRTY MILLION DOLLARS FOR THE NATIONAL GUARD TO HELP THE CUSTOMS SERVICE WITH DRUG INSPECTIONS AT U. S. BORDERS </s>
<s> BUT ADDITIONAL USE OF MILITARY RADAR PLANES EXPANDED NAVAL PATROLS AND MORE FREQUENT AIRCRAFT INTERCEPTIONS COULD DRAIN THE MILITARY'S ALREADY TIGHT OPERATING BUDGETS </s>
<s> THE MEASURE DOESN'T PROVIDE ANY SPECIAL FUNDS FOR THESE OPERATIONS </s>
<s> STEPHEN A. DUZAN CHAIRMAN PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER SAID IT'S OBVIOUSLY QUITE A CHANGE FROM A YEAR AGO </s>
<s> IT'S OUR THIRD YEAR OF CASH FLOW AND WE'VE BEEN PROFITABLE FOR THREE OUT OF THE LAST FOUR QUARTERS </s>
<s> SO WE THINK IN GENERAL THAT THIS REPRESENTS A REAL HEALTHY KIND OF PICTURE FOR A COMPANY WHOSE PRODUCTS AREN'T YET APPROVED </s>
<s> THE COMPANY CURRENTLY HAS FOUR OF ITS EXPERIMENTAL PRODUCTS IN HUMAN CLINICAL TRIALS FOR DISEASES SUCH AS CANCER AND ACQUIRED IMMUNE DEFICIENCY SYNDROME </s>

<s> THE COMPANY HAS BEEN OPERATING WITH COURT PROTECTION FROM CREDITOR LAWSUITS UNDER CHAPTER ELEVEN OF FEDERAL BANKRUPTCY LAW </s>
<s> SINCE MONDAY'S OPENING BELL N. C. N. B. SHARES HAVE JUMPED FOUR AND THREE EIGHTHS POINTS CLOSING AT TWENTY SEVEN AND SEVEN EIGHTHS YESTERDAY </s>
<s> MANY ANALYSTS PREDICT THE STOCK COULD GO HIGHER SOON PERHAPS CROSSING THE THIRTY DOLLAR A SHARE BARRIER FOR THE FIRST TIME IN A YEAR </s>
<s> LONG TERM BULLS PREDICT N. C. N. B.'S PRICE COULD EASILY DOUBLE AND SOME SAY TRIPLE </s>
<s> BUT THE FALL OF J. BILDNER IS MORE THAN JUST ANOTHER SMALL BUSINESS FAILURE </s>
<s> FOR ONE THING IT'S A SPECTACULAR SMALL BUSINESS FAILURE </s>
<s> WHILE MOST YOUNG COMPANIES HAVE SO LITTLE CAPITAL THAT EVEN THE SMALLEST MISSTEP CAN KILL THEM J. BILDNER WAS FLUSH WITH CASH </s>
<s> SO ITS MISTAKES AND ITS LESSONS WERE MAGNIFIED </s>
<s> UNDER PREVIOUS ADMINISTRATIONS CORPORATE BAILOUTS AND RESTRUCTURINGS WERE COMMON </s>
<s> BUT SOME LED TO CHARGES OF CORRUPTION THAT ARE NOW BEING INVESTIGATED IN THE OPPOSITION CONTROLLED NATIONAL ASSEMBLY </s>

<s> THEN MIKHAIL GORBACHEV AND WOJCIECH JARUZELSKI DECIDED TO CLEAR THE AIR </s>

<s> KATYN LED THE AGENDA FOR THE PANEL'S POLES BUT THE SOVIET SIDE BALKED </s>
<s> DREDGING UP KATYN SAID ONE OF ITS MEMBERS WOULD ONLY FOMENT ANTI SOVIET SENTIMENT IN THE POLISH PUBLIC </s>

<s> HIS NINETEEN EIGHTY THREE AUSTERITY PROGRAM WAS APPLAUDED BY EVEN HIS RIGHT -HYPHEN WING OPPONENTS .PERIOD </s>
<s> AFTER NAMING FOUR COMMUNISTS TO HIS ORIGINAL CABINET ,COMMA HE BROKE WITH THE COMMUNISTS IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR AND DESTROYED THEM AS A POLITICAL FORCE .PERIOD </s>
<s> <NOISE> OTHER LARGE AND MIDSIZED CARS POSTING GOOD SCORES WERE THE MERCURY SABLE ,COMMA THE OLDSMOBILE DELTA EIGHTY EIGHT AND THE BUICK REGAL .PERIOD </s>
<s> THREE CARS IN THE CATEGORY PERFORMED POORLY ,COMMA POSTING SCORES ABOVE ONE THOUSAND FOR THE DRIVER'S SIDE .PERIOD </s>
<s> THEY WERE THE BUICK PARK AVENUE ,COMMA THE CHRYSLER NEW YORKER AND THE RENAULT MEDALLION .PERIOD </s>
<s> ALL THE CARS TESTED WERE FOUR -HYPHEN DOOR VEHICLES EXCEPT THE BUICK .PERIOD </s>
<s> MR. ICAHN WANTS TO GIVE HOLDERS A MIXTURE OF TWENTY DOLLARS A SHARE IN CASH AND ABOUT THIRTY DOLLARS A SHARE FACE AMOUNT OF DEBENTURES .PERIOD </s>
<s> ON SOME LEDGERS ,COMMA THAT MIGHT SEEM TO ADD TO UP TO FIFTY DOLLARS .PERIOD </s>
<s> BUT SOME INSIDERS APPARENTLY PREFER THIRTY SIX DOLLARS TO THIRTY EIGHT DOLLARS IN CASH .PERIOD </s>
<s> FOUR T. W. A. VICE PRESIDENTS (LEFT-PAREN THREE CURRENT ,COMMA ONE DEPARTED )RIGHT-PAREN RECENTLY SOLD ALL THEIR SHARES AT THOSE PRICES .PERIOD </s>
<s> THE TREASURY ATTRIBUTED THE DECLINE TO UNUSUALLY STRONG SALES OF BONDS IN OCTOBER NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX ,COMMA THE FIRST MONTH OF FISCAL NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN .PERIOD </s>
<s> BONDS SOLD THAT MONTH WERE THE LAST TO CARRY A MINIMUM SEVEN POINT FIVE PERCENT INTEREST RATE .PERIOD </s>
<s> THE RATE FELL TO SIX PERCENT IN NOVEMBER NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX .PERIOD </s>
